visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a stacked column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Chart title should be in Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. Data series: Series 1 should have the name '2022 Sales' and data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4]. Series 2 should have the name '2023 Sales' and data [144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4, 29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2]. Custom colors: Series 1 should be colored #7cb5ec and Series 2 should be colored #434348. Additional configurations: Chart should have a white background, a margin of 50 pixels on all sides, and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a stacked column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes two data series: '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales'. The X-axis and Y-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The chart title is styled with Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. The data series are colored #7cb5ec for '2022 Sales' and #434348 for '2023 Sales'. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
